page.title: 18LLANGADOG-CHURCH AND CHAPELS
page.content:
There are three chapels and one church in the village of Llangadog.St.Cadog's Church,rebuilt in 1889,stands in the centre of the village but there is no vicar at present.Rev.G.Davies is the minister of Gosen Methodist Chapel built in 1840.Rev.A.Williams is the minister of Providence Independent Chapel built in 1840,but there is no minister at Seion Baptist Chapel built in 1909.Services are held in all four places of worship every Sunday but the number of people attending is very low.A Sunday School is held at both Gosen and Providence Chapels.
The information for The Domesday project in this area was collected and written by the children of Class 3, Llangadog C.P.School,Llangadog,Dyfed.
